metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8071 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: drivers/hid/hid-cp2112.c in the Linux kernel 4.9.x before 4.9.9 uses aspinlock without considering that sleeping is possible in a USB HID requestcallback, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (deadlock)via unspecified vectors.
